text: Toni Borevković (born 18 June 1997) is a Croatian professional footballer who plays for Portuguese club Rio Ave as a centre-back. ==Career== Born in Slavonski Brod, Croatia, Borevković is a product of local NK Marsonia 1909 youth ranks. In June 2018, he started his first experience abroad, joining Rio Ave on a five-year deal.
